sentences.sContent: ...the enthusiasm with which he burrowed through old records in search of facts.
sentences.sCn: …他为了弄清事实在老档案中翻查的热情。

synos.tran: 探索，寻找；挖地洞，挖通道；住入地洞，躲藏起来；钻进某处；偎依著
挖掘，挖出；在…挖洞（或通道）；使躲入洞穴
（兔、狐等的）洞穴，地道；藏身处，住处

trans.tranOther: to make a hole or passage in the ground
a passage in the ground made by an animal such as a rabbit or  fox  as a place to live
